From Python To Gen AI", instructor: "Dr. Satyajit Pattnaik", rating: 4.5, count: "1,623", price: "E£309.99", oldPrice: "E£349.99", bestseller: true }, ], "Python": [ { id: 5, image: "https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/240x135/543600_64d1_4.jpg", title: "Automate the Boring Stuff with Python Programming", instructor: "Al Sweigart", rating: 4.7, count: "110k", price: "E£299.99", oldPrice: "E£349.99", bestseller: true }, { id: 6, image: "https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/240x135/2776760_f176_10.jpg", title: "100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp", instructor: "Dr. Angela Yu", rating: 4.7, count: "250k", price: "E£309.99", oldPrice: "E£599.99", bestseller: true }, { id: 7, image: "https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/240x135/903744_8eb2.jpg", title: "Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp", instructor: "Jose Portilla", rating: 4.5, count: "140k", price: "E£309.99", oldPrice: "E£499.99", bestseller: false } ], "Digital Marketing": [ { id: 8, image: "https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/240x135/914296_3670_8.jpg", title: "The Complete Digital Marketing Course - 12 Courses in 1", instructor: "Rob Percival", rating: 4.5, count: "750k", price: "E£309.99", oldPrice: "E£699.99", bestseller: true }, ], "Amazon AWS": [ { id: 9, image: "https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/240x135/362328_91f3_10.jpg", title: "AWS Certified Solutions Architect", instructor: "Stephane Maarek", rating: 4.7, count: "900k", price: "E£309.99", oldPrice: "E£699.99", bestseller: true }, ] }; function NavBar() { // Data for the dropdown menu const exploreGoals = [ "Learn AI", "Launch a new career", "Prepare for a certification", "Practice with Role Play" ]; const exploreCategories = [ "Development", "Business", "Finance & Accounting", "IT & Software", "Office Productivity", "Personal Development", "Design", "Marketing", "Lifestyle", "Photography & Video", "Health & Fitness", "Music", "Teaching & Academics" ]; const ChevronRight = () => ( ); return (
